about.description:
zfp is an open source C/C++ library for compressed numerical arrays
that support high throughput read and write random access. zfp also
supports streaming compression of integer and floating-point data,
e.g., for applications that read and write large data sets to and
from disk. zfp is primarily written in C and C++ but also includes
Python and Fortran bindings.
about.summary: Library for compressed numerical arrays that support high throughput read and write random access

name: zfpy
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.20.3
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: zfpy
    version: 0.5.5
source:
    patches:
        - 100-update-cmake.patch
    sha256: 6a7f4934489087d9c117a4af327fd6495ea757924f4df467b9c537abf8bd86c4
    url: https://github.com/LLNL/zfp/archive/0.5.5.tar.gz
build:
    number: 3
    script: source ${RECIPE_DIR}/build_zfpy.sh
    string: py37h6d0141a_3
requirements:
    build:
        - bzip2 1.0.8 haf1e3a3_3
        - c-ares 1.16.1 haf1e3a3_3
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - cctools_osx-64 949.0.1 h5ba7a2e_7
        - clang 10.0.1 default_hf57f61e_1
        - clang_osx-64 10.0.1 h05bbb7f_10
        - clangxx 10.0.1 default_hf57f61e_1
        - clangxx_osx-64 10.0.1 h05bbb7f_10
        - cmake 3.18.2 h9f6fb0d_0
        - compiler-rt 10.0.1 he6db49b_0
        - compiler-rt_osx-64 10.0.1 h033240e_0
        - expat 2.2.9 hb1e8313_2
        - krb5 1.17.1 h75d18d8_3
        - ld64_osx-64 530 h3c32e8a_7
        - libclang-cpp10 10.0.1 default_hf57f61e_1
        - libcurl 7.71.1 h9bf37e3_8
        - libcxx 10.0.1 h5f48129_0
        - libedit 3.1.20191231 h0678c8f_2
        - libev 4.33 haf1e3a3_1
        - libllvm10 10.0.1 h009f743_3
        - libnghttp2 1.41.0 h7580e61_2
        - libssh2 1.9.0 h8a08a2b_5
        - libuv 1.40.0 haf1e3a3_0
        - llvm-tools 10.0.1 h1341992_3
        - make 4.3 h0b31af3_0
        - ncurses 6.2 hb1e8313_2
        - openssl 1.1.1h haf1e3a3_0
        - rhash 1.3.6 h1de35cc_1001
        - tapi 1000.10.8 h879752b_4
        - tk 8.6.10 hb0a8c7a_1
        - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h7795811_1009
    host:
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - cython 0.29.21 py37h08f6e3d_1
        - libblas 3.8.0 17_openblas
        - libcblas 3.8.0 17_openblas
        - libcxx 10.0.1 h5f48129_0
        - libffi 3.2.1 hb1e8313_1007
        - libgfortran 5.0.0 h7cc5361_12
        - libgfortran5 9.3.0 h7cc5361_12
        - liblapack 3.8.0 17_openblas
        - libopenblas 0.3.10 openmp_h54245bb_5
        - llvm-openmp 10.0.1 h28b9765_0
        - ncurses 6.2 hb1e8313_2
        - numpy 1.16.5 py37hde6bac1_0
        - openssl 1.1.1h haf1e3a3_0
        - python 3.7.8 hc9dea61_1_cpython
        - python_abi 3.7 1_cp37m
        - readline 8.0 h0678c8f_2
        - sqlite 3.33.0 h960bd1c_1
        - tk 8.6.10 hb0a8c7a_1
        - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
        - zfp 0.5.5 hb1e8313_3
        - zlib 1.2.11 h7795811_1009
    run:
        - libcxx >=10.0.1
        - numpy >=1.16.5,<2.0a0
        - python >=3.7,<3.8.0a0
        - python_abi 3.7.* *_cp37m
        - zfp 0.5.5 hb1e8313_3
test:
    imports:
        - zfpy
about:
    description: 'zfp is an open source C/C++ library for compressed numerical arrays

        that support high throughput read and write random access. zfp also

        supports streaming compression of integer and floating-point data,

        e.g., for applications that read and write large data sets to and

        from disk. zfp is primarily written in C and C++ but also includes

        Python and Fortran bindings.

        '
    dev_url: https://github.com/LLNL/zfp
    doc_url: http://zfp.readthedocs.io/en/release0.5.5/
    home: https://computation.llnl.gov/projects/floating-point-compression
    license: BSD-3-Clause
    license_family: BSD
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: Library for compressed numerical arrays that support high throughput
        read and write random access
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - GarrettDMorrison
        - ToreAad
        - hmaarrfk
        - kmpaul
        - lindstro
